description: Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) is a durable thermoplastic often used for injection molding and 3D printing.
short desc: Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) is a durable thermoplastic often used when molding manufactured parts.
source: Samples cut from 0.31 cm thick, 30 cm by 30 cm commercially available sheet.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.

derived property.test description: Effective heat of combustion [MJ/kg] is calculated from data collected in micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments.
